resources.string: NOTAM (ICAO format) are fully decoded, with MAP view and SHARE capabilities (share all of them or a single NOTAM with an image or text)!
NOTAM validity period is updated continuously and shown in red if active!
Two independent NOTAM sources that allow Q notam decoding worldwide (source 1).

Cavokator was not certified for in-flight use, please do not use it for real flight operations or do so under your own responsability. There might be errors and the information shown might not be complete.
